task.title: Creating projects
task.shortdesc: This task illustrates how to create a project.

context.p: A project is needed to start a search.

step.cmd: Enter a projectname and a Product or formula name to describe your product.
Under Ingredient, an ingredient can be selected from the list of predefined ingredients.
Also under Ingredient, a GCAS code can be selected from the list of predefined ingredients.
Select File Exit to close the program.
